objects.specification: The floor is a single flat panel with a smooth matte finish in neutral gray, covering the entire booth area. It features minimal thickness and clean edges, providing a sturdy and even walking surface appropriate for an indoor exhibition environment.
This wall panel is a smooth vertical surface in light gray with a clean matte finish. It is part of the front elevation and provides structural enclosure while maintaining a minimalist appearance.
This wall panel is a smooth vertical surface in light gray with a clean matte finish. It is part of the front elevation and provides structural enclosure while maintaining a minimalist appearance.
This continuous back wall panel is finished in light gray with a subtle matte texture. It encloses the rear of the booth and offers a clean backdrop for displays or graphics.
This side wall panel is a smooth vertical element in light gray, featuring a matte finish. It encloses the left side of the booth and contributes to the uniform enclosure design.
This side wall panel is a smooth vertical element in light gray, featuring a matte finish. It encloses the right side of the booth and contributes to the uniform enclosure design.

This registration desk has a bold rectangular form with a flat top surface and solid side panels, finished in bright blue. It features crisp edges and a glossy finish, creating a striking focal point that faces the main entrance.

This display stand is a tall rectangular pedestal finished in vibrant red, featuring a flat top surface and solid block base. It has a smooth matte finish and clean lines, ideal for showcasing promotional materials against the back wall.

This display stand is a tall rectangular pedestal finished in vibrant red, featuring a flat top surface and solid block base. It has a smooth matte finish and clean lines, ideal for showcasing promotional materials against the left wall.

This display stand is a tall rectangular pedestal finished in vibrant red, featuring a flat top surface and solid block base. It has a smooth matte finish and clean lines, ideal for showcasing promotional materials against the right wall.

This visitor table features a rectangular tabletop with gently rounded edges and four slender legs, finished in warm wood tone. It has a smooth matte surface suitable for casual seating and small group discussions.

This visitor chair has a square seat, straight backrest, and four slender legs, all finished in neutral gray. It features a smooth matte surface and simple modern profile for comfortable seating.

This vertical banner panel is rendered in vibrant orange fabric with a smooth, slightly translucent surface. It has clean straight edges and lightweight material, hanging flush with the ceiling depth without visual clutter.

This pendant light is a thin cylindrical fixture finished in pale yellow, measuring 0.6 meters in diameter and 0.2 meters in height. It emits a warm, diffuse glow suitable for ambient ceiling illumination in an exhibition space.
